document.title: Health Education Standards of Learning for Virginia Public Schools

BAE40F8A51DE4D30B0B6AF48C221DCE8.description:
Research community service opportunities to address air, noise, and other
environmental health issues for peers and community groups to volunteer and work on
together.

9EFA2BCBE14647B9851BF98036603EE5.description: Practice ways to respond to and report harassing behaviors.

02A0275B92C940CFBE44DC8047BC48F2.description: Advocate for a caring school environment.

36C00ED0201442D4807473D4CAD7B8CE.description: Describe ways to offer friendship and support to someone who has been cyberbullied.

A5D66C6B09FC46ACBE77D9890F3F6849.description: Demonstrate effective communication skills to defuse or resolve conflict.

19C336D36A9946C7873FFD0923E54567.description:
Identify healthy activities that students can do with friends and family to build positive
relationships.

FDBA2CF62CAB45A983452819B6832347.description: Analyze positive and negative influences on self-image (e.g., media, peers).

650192951DAB48AB8DDDA80293B45DEC.description:
Identify prevention resources and strategies for avoiding alcohol, tobacco, inhalants,
and other drugs.

BD0D3D48358542AAA04E6F47CD4BC77A.description:
Encourage others not to use alcohol, tobacco, nicotine products, marijuana, inhalants,
or other harmful drugs.

88996D6CB98F4FECB7E0CE727B64AB68.description:
Explore the role of parents/guardians and health professionals as resources to promote
health, prevent disease, and create a healthy community.

365DB924583A47ED8EFA984035CBE674.description: Identify strategies to protect against the harmful effects of the sun.

D621CA5ED4404245AEC437B2A2299196.description:
Support family and peers in making positive food, physical activity, and sleep choices
that promote heart health.

0EB49943344D4CC6A82995DAFEF9A3B6.description: Promote sale and consumption of healthy beverages.

9647CDF592304598BE147CE600726B1A.description:
Design marketing materials to increase the sale and consumption of healthy foods and
beverages that meet RDA and energy balance for health.

42361FB8FF2B4888BAAA43D777B9793C.description:
Analyze and interpret information on food packaging, including Nutrition Facts Labels,
ingredient lists, and health claims.

7F704E1483FD4CDFA8FB9D7699572474.description:
Describe ways to prevent vision and hearing loss and the associated healthcare
professionals (e.g., optometrist, ophthalmologist, audiologist).

24B8D32438874E0992812E8766E7AF06.description: Describe ways to care for the integumentary system (e.g., personal hygiene, sun safety).

BF50120A0F364982A152F6933B5F6DBB.description:
The student will explain how peers, families, and community groups work together to
promote health, prevent disease, and create a healthy community.

B08457F3C4F743238C8024CF1041BB3E.description:
Describe strategies to decrease the impact of air quality and noise pollution on body
function and the environment.

AD11955DEF124F669D6602B44E730039.description: Describe how to respond to and report harassing behaviors.

3EAEDE5D6C50485AA50CD5B477C5E257.description: Demonstrate how to show respect for individual differences.

BDDB94F55F7C478DB19A0531EE984697.description: Describe how to report cyberbullying at school and at home.

1BC375CC2A2E41A8BDADA2249B0867B5.description: Ability to analyze the role of feelings/emotions in conflict resolution situations.

31D05DD346BF4ADCB8D1865A02AE1E94.description:
Describe the benefits of healthy relationships with family, friends, and other adult
mentors.

9C6917A0AC7048B8A004B105BF079D92.description: Recognize the importance of developing and maintaining a positive self-image.

CC31F57D495C40219685B0435EED56DE.description: Identify positive and negative ways to manage stress in a variety of situations.

7F00E615FDE04A1589A91DC223C41A46.description: Examine one’s role and the role of others in causing or preventing injuries at school.

FF59CB26F91441C0B65B49E198FA2035.description: Describe how to get help and assistance with mental health and substance use concerns.

1C78504D5E6249BD9B9FAC4EFA76FEED.description:
Describe effective communication skills to request assistance in situations where
alcohol, tobacco, nicotine products, marijuana, inhalants, and other drugs are being
abused.

C187BD9619F4410EA5FD090876EB5DCB.description:
Explain the importance of dental care, hand washing, and other personal hygiene habits
for good health.

9621BABF7D75420E805D03E805806B84.description: Determine strategies to protect against the harmful effects of the sun.

C6C254916073489DBE805C6846DBF809.description:
Review personal health habits that support heart health and the ability to perform
various physical activities.

67D91588F5FF410EB2FD955A24A1060A.description:
Identify the influence of marketing techniques on food and beverage choices (e.g.,
caffeinated beverages).

AEB9768819794D66A5268E596970CE3A.description: Analyze food labels for a selected meal that meets RDA and energy balance for health.

5066DAC11CC14A54822A02DBCF9F9EBA.description: Explain the RDA for macronutrients and micronutrients.

8ABBD5AD3A274555871CD3A12B057CF3.description: Identify behaviors and environments that can lead to vision and hearing loss.

C2414C2638B346D09827AF90B431FE4B.description: Describe the importance of maintaining a healthy integumentary system.

F2E2DE9F36B24FF692549F4F04B48B11.description:
The student will demonstrate responsibility for developing personal health habits and
practicing behaviors that promote an active, healthy lifestyle.

A09AE19833C447D998BCBD7A07F85542.description: Describe the effects of air and noise pollution on health and the environment.

9BFBCE68546B4C9686F934BB9DD20721.description: Recognize the influence of violence in the media on behaviors.

1D3F81A57C9F48E0940B93F944F13DD4.description: Define cyberbullying and its impact on one’s health and well-being.

57A872794E7E4A68A8AFD32CC447AFE9.description:
Identify effective verbal and nonverbal communication skills for resolving conflict
situations.

50B6B15E04904EF48F81A3B02E949FF1.description:
Identify components of healthy relationships and the social skills that are essential for
building and sustaining relationships with family and friends.

8E06C86BDFDF418DA333AD6CFD38D0AD.description: Define stress and identify physical and emotional responses caused by stress.

2432097514884164B4BC0B84D392FD27.description: Analyze why people choose to follow or not follow safety rules at school.

A72A90F2CCFB424ABB0CDC9EFA52CBA6.description: Explain the connection between mental health and substance use.

18B8D3C5A06A4A4EACD5D4A6611E3CF4.description:
Analyze the effects of the use of alcohol, tobacco, nicotine products, marijuana,
inhalants, and other drugs on relationships with family, peers, and other individuals.

31B3BB9F725B4DE6BDA8A1DEBF59289E.description: Describe hygiene habits that promote good health.

BEBAAF0D85A544568E2F68125581984C.description: Examine the health risks associated with unprotected sun exposure.

12B96E995330474E88D4420D8CBB5495.description:
Explain the effects of physical activity, sleep, and personal health habits and behaviors
on heart health.

33A2556338C44EB39F98DD9F68C49B32.description: Describe the effects of caffeine on the body.

3853C5532DF94F409BB79A18EDF906A9.description:
Explain Recommended Dietary Allowance (RDA) and the concepts of eating in
moderation and energy balance in relation to healthy weight.

E17E410EB0A74704A5629A348389E662.description: Define macronutrients and micronutrients and how the body uses each.

05D802C4F2954B6A9CB20D30AAFA8754.description: Identify the major structures and functions of the eyes and ears.

31B9048421BA45F2B812141CE6585603.description:
Identify the major structures and functions of the integumentary (skin, hair, and nails)
system.

76E227F4693E4BAC8575AC261F67438A.description:
The student will analyze the impact of positive health behaviors and risky behaviors on
personal health.
